Sentencas: This study presents a fabrication process via experimental observations for curved porous multilayer structures with a single-step, co-sintering operation.
Titulo: Fabrication of Three-Dimensional Wavy Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell by In Situ Observation of Curvature Evolution

Sentencas: Active monitoring of the shrinkage behavior of each porous layer during the co-sintering process leads to minimize mismatched stresses along with avoidance of severe warping and cracking.
Titulo: Fabrication of Three-Dimensional Wavy Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell by In Situ Observation of Curvature Evolution

Sentencas: During co-sintering, in-plane stresses are developed in each layer due to differing shrinkage behaviors between layers.
Titulo: Fabrication of Three-Dimensional Wavy Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell by In Situ Observation of Curvature Evolution

Sentencas: Analysis of curvature evolution using in situ monitoring of the structure was performed in the design of a curved multilayer structure via the co-sintering process.
Titulo: Fabrication of Three-Dimensional Wavy Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell by In Situ Observation of Curvature Evolution

Sentencas: Materials used are NiO/CGO for anode; CGO for electrolyte; and LSCF for cathode.
Titulo: Fabrication of Three-Dimensional Wavy Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell by In Situ Observation of Curvature Evolution

Sentencas: These materials are tape casted with 20 m thickness and stacked to form bi- and triple-layer structures by hot-pressing.
Titulo: Fabrication of Three-Dimensional Wavy Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell by In Situ Observation of Curvature Evolution

Sentencas: Bilayers, consisting of NiO/CGO-CGO and CGO-LSCF, were co-sintered up to 1200 degrees
Titulo: Fabrication of Three-Dimensional Wavy Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell by In Situ Observation of Curvature Evolution
Fabrication of Three-Dimensional Wavy Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell by In Situ Observation of Curvature Evolution

Sentencas: The maximum sintering mismatched stress was calculated at the interface of bilayer structure.
Titulo: Fabrication of Three-Dimensional Wavy Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell by In Situ Observation of Curvature Evolution

Sentencas: In situ observation, to monitor the shrinkage of each material and the curvature evolution of the bi- and triple-layer structures, was performed using a long focus microscope (Infinity K-2).
Titulo: Fabrication of Three-Dimensional Wavy Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell by In Situ Observation of Curvature Evolution

Sentencas: Thereby, viscosity, shrinkage rate of each material, and curvature rate were calculated to determine the mismatched stresses.
Titulo: Fabrication of Three-Dimensional Wavy Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell by In Situ Observation of Curvature Evolution

Sentencas: The monitored results contributed to development of novel design of curved 3D multilayer structures during co-sintering.
Titulo: Fabrication of Three-Dimensional Wavy Single-Chamber Solid Oxide Fuel Cell by In Situ Observation of Curvature Evolution
